decision_conditions: <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-b58a31be-7fff-20a8-b29d-5034e151d917"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">The proposal, by reason of its detailed design, size, and location, would extend the rear first floor of the host property, representing an overdominant and obtrusive extension when read in conjunction with the rest of the extensions to the site. The proposal </span></span><span style="white-space-collapse: preserve; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">would be out of keeping with the host building and the terrace it forms part of. As such the proposal is contrary to policy </span><span style="white-space-collapse: preserve; background-color: transparent; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">LP1 (Design Quality and Local Character), </span><span style="white-space-collapse: preserve; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">of the Hackney LP33 Local Plan (2020), policies </span><span id="docs-internal-guid-32629a08-7fff-0bb2-38f0-e3055efcf06a"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">D3 (Optimising site capacity through the design-led approach), </span></span><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13.3333px; white-space-collapse: preserve;">D4 </span><span style="white-space-collapse: preserve; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;"><font face="Arial"><span style="font-size: 10pt;">(</span></font></span><span style="white-space-collapse: preserve; background-color: transparent; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Delivering good design) </span><span style="white-space-collapse: preserve; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">o</span><span style="white-space-collapse: preserve; background-color: transparent; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">f the London Plan (2021), and the guidance contained in Hackney's ‘Residential Extensions and Alterations’ SPD (2009).</span><br></p>
description: Erection of single storey first floor rear extension
